# recognizedPoints(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the points for a joint group name the observation recognizes.

## Declaration

```swift
func recognizedPoints(_ jointsGroupName: VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName) throws -> [VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointName : VNRecognizedPoint]
```

## Parameters

- **jointsGroupName**: The joint group of the points to retrieve.

## Return Value

The dictionary of points the observation associates with the group name.

## Accessing Points

- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.
- **VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointName**: The joint names for an animal body pose.
- **availableJointGroupNames**: The available joint group names in the observation.
- **VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName**: The joint group names for an animal body pose.
- **recognizedPoint(_:)**: Returns the point for a joint name the observation recognizes.
